options.content:
SAMM

Samana Advanced Monitoring and Management System

🏠 Main Dashboard 🚨 CVAD Alerts 🌐 NetScaler 🖥️ XenServer ☁️ AWS

📊 SAMM Dashboard Tutorial

🎯 What is SAMM?

SAMM (System Administration and Monitoring Management) is a comprehensive monitoring dashboard that provides real-time insights into your infrastructure health. It monitors various components including CVAD, NetScaler, Windows servers, and XenServer environments.

🔍 How to Navigate

  • Click on any panel to navigate to detailed dashboards
  • Each panel shows real-time metrics and status
  • Blue indicators mean healthy status
  • Use the time picker to adjust time ranges

⚡ Key Features

  • Real-time monitoring and alerting
  • Historical data analysis
  • Customizable time ranges
  • Interactive visualizations

📋 Dashboard Categories

CVAD Dashboards:
  • Alerts & Failures
  • Overall Status
  • Site Information
NetScaler:
  • Overview & Status
  • Performance Metrics
Windows Servers:
  • Server Status
  • Logon Times
  • Event Monitoring
XenServer:
  • Host Information
  • Pool Status
  • VM Monitoring

💡 Pro Tips

  • Time Range: Use the time picker in the top-right to focus on specific periods
  • Refresh: Dashboards auto-refresh, but you can manually refresh if needed
  • Drill Down: Click on any metric to get more detailed information
  • Alerts: Pay attention to blue or orange indicators for immediate action items
